column5: Well my Grandpa died yesterday at the age of 98.He was a WWII vet he went in through Italy when they stormed Juno Beach and I thank him for that.My Grandma was a War Bride and her and my Mom(@2 years old) came to Canada from Scotland.Grandpa met up with them after the war. Grandma passed away a long time ago.I made my kids sit down and listen to his stories of the war and why we have such a great country to live in.Thanks Grandpa and RIPIf anyone has a drink in their hand lets all cheers my Grandpa.
My condolences . I'll raise a glass, and tip my head in his honour. Thanks to him all all who fought beside him
Thanx for the nice story.  RIP Grandpa
God bless your grandpa and thanks for your service to the country

Rodbender God bless your familyGod bless any one who serves our countryWhat a rounded out lifeI can only imagine the storeys he would have toldThx for sharing thru grieving there is also celebration of ones lifeGod bless during this time
Chad I'm sorry for your loss. I'm sure he was a great man and I appreciate him for all is efforts serving Canada in WWII and beyond!
it's because of him I'm sitting here and reading this. I wish my my parents could thank him. may he rest in peace for what he did for us his family and country.
Simple mistake, Rod Caster is Chad  I thank your Grampa for what he did, I'm glad he made it back home, sorry for your loss
I would like to say a thank you to your Grampa for his service so we can have the freedom that we all enjoy today. Sorry for your loss. R.I.P.

Simple mistake, Rod Caster is Chad  I thank your Grampa for what he did, I'm glad he made it back home, sorry for your loss oops - apologies Rodbender - type font on the phone is too small for these old eyes.

Well my Grandpa died yesterday at the age of 98.   Thanks Grandpa and RIP  If anyone has a drink in their hand lets all cheers my Grandpa. Rodbender, for your Grandpa and all the other Veterans that helped save this Great Country of ours I will have a Long Great Drink in their HONOR... Salute for sure and may he rest in peace
So sorry for your loss Rodbender my condolences to you and your family you must of been very proud of your Grandpa may he rest in peace.  Mitch
